评论详情: Gorgeous skirt
Love this skirt! It’s comfy and a good length. Can be dressed up or down for what you need.
I love this skirt and receive so many compliments. I wish I would have sized down one but I love it. I am 5'9.  This skirt is not for shorter people.

I really love this skirt. I purchased it to wear to my bachelorette brunch and bridal shower with a fitted long sleeve Pumiey top. The sparrow pattern is super unique to me. It's also the perfect length. I got the M/L, I weigh 165 lb., and I'm 5'7". The two issues I have with it are that it's completely sheer. I held it up to a window and I could see right through it, so I will need to purchase a slip to wear underneath, and because of that, I think this skirt is overpriced. So just know that you'll need to purchase an additional undergarment to wear with it.
Gorgeous drape. Feels very high quality. I am 5’6” and can wear it high waisted and it grazes the floor barefoot (the perfect length IMO). Would definitely buy again.
No stretch in band. Would not recommend
I dressed this skirt down with a white tee and sandals foe a perfect summer outfit.  The skirt is beautiful.

评论概述: Very beautiful. Full skirt. Slightly long but wedges will help.
评论详情: Lots of fabric. Very vibrant. I loved how full the skirt was. They didn't skimp there. Definitely slimmer fit.

A style blogger I follow online recommended the skirt. I probably wouldn't have bought it if I wouldn't have seen it on her. It really is lovely and can be dressed up or down. I'm a medium and it fit great. Really excellent value for the money.

评论概述: Beautiful but Materials and Size may vary
评论详情: This skirt is lovely and the design is great. I purchased the lilac/orange as well as the green/magenta flower. Both skirts are floor length with a knee length underskirt. You may still want a slip for modesty, as the skirt and underskirt are both sheer. I usually wear a half slip underneath so that is not an issue.  My lilac skirt is BEAUTIFUL and the material feels like quality. Size varies somewhat. I’m 5’9” with approximately a 30” waist. Size large fit well in lilac but I had to reorder the green one a size up, as the first one I ordered was too snug. I actually prefer the looser XXL waist size. Both move with grace and I get compliments.  Unfortunately the green came in a different material. Still pretty, but underskirt feels like plastic and doesn’t breath at all. The over skirt looks nice but it is not the same great quality and feel as the other skirt. If you are going to purchase, I would suggest that you order a few at a time in case of inconsistent quality and return the ones that don’t measure up.

评论概述: Perfect fit, and I love the fabric
评论详情: Was a bit long, so I hemmed it myself
To small
I was wanting this for a fun summer skirt but it was very puffy with a lot of layers. Good quality though!

类型: Size: X-Small-SmallColor: Bluish Floral Fresh Aroma
评论详情: I have a tiny waist and the waist on this is even tinier, causing a host of GI problems for the wearer. They won’t refund if you accidentally take the tag off, despite trying it on only.

Liked the skirt in the picture.  Pale yellow looks lovely and elegant.  Actual color was almost neon yellow and garish.  I’m 5 ft 5 in and skirt was about 3 to 4 inches too long.  Also very tight in the waist.  Instant return

I was surprised this was Chicwish, my product was good. I ordered a large, I'm 5'5" and 170#. Even with 3" espadrille wedges, skirt touched the floor. I gave this skirt to my daughter, who is 6'. The bottom of skirt hit herankles, perfect! I did notice the med is 10" shorter so ordered that size.

I bought this shirt for myself and ended up gifting it to my daughter.  It’s really long not meant for shorter people, I’m 5.2” and even with heals i would have to roll it.  My daughter is 5.8” and it was perfect for her.  Very pretty skirt nice and flowy.  Love the colors.
What a beautiful skirt i really love it. So many compliments received. Top is also from same brand its also as beautiful as skirt
I love this skirt so much I am thinking of ordering another one in another color It makes a perfect date day skirt, I am tall and it works for me
I am shorter, but I can easily adjust so this isn't too long. This is a skirt that will not go in or out of style, nicely made and I look forward to wearing it.
great for the pre summer purchase. true to size. 130-140 medium buy
it is beautiful but different material then shown!
This skirt was beautiful. I received SO MANY compliments the day I wore it for a special presentation in front of over 100 people. It was my power outfit for sure!

I feel like it differs slightly in color than the picture, BUT this skirt is a great fit (true to size) with an elastic waist band. It is lined to a midi length and then the rest of the skirt is unlined, which adds a little sass and extra fun. I wore it with 3 inch navy heels (I am 5’5”) so it will be long on anyone average height or below. I also wore it high-waisted. All of that being said, I love the skirt and is perfect for any non-formal summer occasion. Also, it twirls beautifully for anyone who has an inner princess just dying to know. ☺️
I love the colors and fit. I need a blouse to match, which I haven't found yer.
This skirt is beautiful. The fabric looks more expensive than it is. I'm 5'11 and it was perfect maxi skirt length on me.
The skirt is of so soft material. Liked the floral print on it.
I love this skirt! I wore this on my Bachelorette wine tasting trip and got so many compliments. Definitely recommend!
This skirt was perfect! It fit great. It was long but I’m only 5’2”. Great quality material
I really liked the pattern, however the elastic waist wasn't forgiving. It will be returned
Bought to wear to my first grandson’s upcoming high school graduation. Fits perfectly, excellent quality. Will have for years to come!
Pretty, flowing skirt.  Good for hot weather.  Length is great as I am tall.  Planning to wear to a Spring wedding in April.  It is thin but not see through.
When the skirt arrived had way more yellow than the picture portrayed
Got a ton of compliments wearing this with white blouse tucked in and jean jacket. Nice quality and super flowy!
I love this and get comments every single time I wear it. Fits true to size, perfect length and vibrant colors. Love how flowy and lightweight it is.
Perfect fit, length & flowiness. Just what I was looking for
Comfortable and beautiful!  5’9, 155lbs and wore with wedges
This skirt is so fun to wear! It just floats around my ankles. I love it! It's really long. I'm 5'9" and I've stepped on it a few times. That may be because I'm not used to skirts :)

Great print but the waist is far too small... even the largest available size.  Really makes no sense because it's a elastic waist yet not good quality elastic therefore doesn't stretch as much as typical elastic.  Plenty of fabric around the waist... just crappy elastic.  I could fix it but why pay this for something I need to turn around and fix.
It’s it perfect length on me as well as a beautiful pattern.  Fully lined (slip) inside - purchased the purple - it’s my 2nd purchase

This skirt fit well, and was super soft and flowy. The stitching wasn’t great, but also in line for something at this price point. I wanted to badly to love this skirt, but it was incredibly sheer. The liner was equally as sheer, and only went to about my knees- different than the product image that shows it as full length. While wearing the skirt you could easily see everything through the skirt. I would have considered keeping the skirt if I was looking for a beach vacation, but this is a skirt I was hoping would transition me through the early fall, which is not possible. I am retuning the skirt.
Returned the skirt.  Print looked very cheap.
This was returned it was too small

评论概述: The white tropical does NOT look like pics
评论详情: The white tropical one is absolutely NOT white. It is cream and green. There is not a blue color to the flowers like it is in the photos. It's very misleading if you're expecting the colors aren't what's pictured. Its made alright and it def long enough but I wanted the white and blue.
This skirt is exactly as advertised.  It's very nice.  Waist is elastic.  It's very vibrant.  It's "summer" looking, but also a lot of material so not great for being outside in the heat.

评论概述: Little to no stretch in the waist band
评论详情: Super cute. Exactly as pictured. Little to no stretch in the waist band for hormonal shifts in size. Runs small to begin with.
Very light, can layer with leggings underneath once it gets to colder seasons. Very feminine and girly! I love it. Super easy to put an outfit together with this.
El negro se azul oscuro. Pero está muy linda.
Great maxi skirt for tall girls! I’m 5’10” and the skirt was a perfect length

I'm so mad about how crappy and cheap this is for the $39 I spent. It's completely see through even with the lining. Lining dose NOT go to the floor and it's more green in color than the photo shows. The seems pucker on the sides and because it's made with several panels...I have a seem that goes rite down the center of my crotch. Super disappointed and DO NOT recommend at all. The shipping took almost a month!!!!!
Me gustó mucho! La tele es delgada pero muy bonita, sólo me queda larga pero soy de estatura pequeña, buena calidad.

I purchased this skirt originally to wear to a wedding. I ended up going with another long dress, but my husband and my sister talked me into keeping this because they loved it so much. It is vibrant, flows beautifully, and and is comfortable. The print feels unique and draws attention in the best way.
Love this skirt! Got many compliments and even got a coworker to get one as well. Very flowy, nice fabric, looks the best with white top and denim jacket, perfect outfit for spring or fall.
Second time ordering one of these skirts and I get the most compliments when I wear them, personally I love twirling in for no reason. Perfect for dinner dates, outings, or really whatever.

I ordered this after reading reviews it fit perfectly. ( I ordered an Xxl I hold my weight in my stomach so with this being a long maxi skirt I pulled it pass my belly button and I will be able To belt it and not feel Uncomfortable. I am short 5’4” so most everything I wear on my bottom half I have to have hem but I enjoy a long maxi skirt. Just keep that in mind you may need to have it altered if you don’t Like things to long.
I am only 4’11” so I have to have it altered but the skirt is beautiful and I can’t wait to wear it
Lots of compliments everytime I wear this!
It fits to my anoles. Comfortable to wear and I feel pretty in it.

评论概述: Beautiful skirt, but very, very long!
评论详情: I'm 5'8" and this gorgeous skirt is way, way too long!
Beautiful color and love the way the material is flouncy and flowy. Have not washed it yet. A little concerned about “do not dry in sunlight”, will it melt?
Purchased it for my daughter for her birthday and it runs really small. She wasn’t able to get it past her hips
The color was more mustard yellow than sunshine as shown in the picture. I am 5'6" I ordered a medium, even after rolling the waist band twice it was still too long.
It's sheer and see through but with a slip it'll be okay. I love the design
Got this for my she looked amazing it’s a beautiful dress
Just as pictured. Very nice and long. Fits well. Perfect length and the weight is good too. I'm only 5'3 and it was not too long. I paired it with a green top. Got lots of compliments

I absolutely love this maxi skirt. I'm 5'9" with long legs and a short torso. Even with long legs, this skirt was long enough which never happens. I'm typically a 6 or 28 in pants, with a 32"inseam. I ordered the m-l and it is perfect. The flow is great. Pairing it with a tank, denim jacket and chucks.

Love it got a lot of compliments on it. I will say I’m 5’10 and it was still long so much so I did trip once or twice on it lol but overall it’s a great flowy long skirt. I’ll most likely purchase in another one of their patterns. Great buy!
Excellent quality! I have had sooo many compliments.

评论概述: Nice idea but not the best execution
评论详情: Fit is nice and length is good - when sitting above my belly button, the hem is just above the floor and I'm 5'7. The liner is nice and the shirt is not see through. However the fabric feels really cheap and the outer skirt itself is made of 4 different panels so there's a ton of seams. I feel like the seam at the bottom is not pretty given the price of the skirt. Additionally the pattern is not as pretty as the pics make it seem. Overall I like the idea of the skirt but for the price I'm going to return this one and look for higher quality options.

I have ordered several skirts directly off Chicwish website and the skirts were AMAZING in quality & always fit perfectly. But I decided to order this one through Amazon & will not be doing it again.  The skirt was nothing like the other skirts I ordered. The material was a lot thinner, the lining was stiff & it was very small.  For the amount of money I paid for this skirt, I was not satisfied for how poor made it was. I will be ordering directly through Chicwish
This is a beatiful skirt and it fits me very Nice. I brought size XL My waist is about 36inch...I'm 5.3
Wore the skirt for a professional photoshoot in Paris. Loved how it felt and looked. Received so many compliments.
I'm 5'4 so usually with maxi skirts they are long on me. This one I do have to wear it up higher above my waist. But it's such a beautiful skirt! I love how flowy it is and the colors are so pretty!

Not that well made.  Uncomfortable fit.  Runs small, really tight elastic waistband.  Several layers of fabric which made the skirt nice and full, but the fabric itself was cheap and itchy.  I returned my skirt.

I was on the fence because I don’t wear a lot of color in my wardrobe when I do I it isn’t purple.. I wore this to an Art fair and felt like Art. Looks like a more expensive piece than it is. Just buy it!

I ordered XL because L was not an option. This fits nicely, I am 5'9" and 190 lbs. The length hits me at the ankles perfectly. I paired it with a white tank and dark jean jacket along with white sneakers. I love it! I wanted a casual fun outfit for a trip we are planning and this will work perfect.
Exactly as pictured.  I am 5’6” and it definitely touches the floor with flats.  I will either shorten it or wear with heels.

I wore this to my sister's wedding. It lasted 6 hours of wear LOL. The skirt is absolutely gorgeous but be careful. Will rip and snag easy like a pair of delicate nylon pantyhose. You can't iron very well either. Even the lowest setting on an iron will melt the fabric. Spraying with anti-static spray on the sheer layer will stain it a darker color and it's hard to wash out. It was gorgeous for a day!
The skirt flowed so beautifully as I walked around. I love it. Slightly olive color vs the photo but I like it
Beautiful skirt that fits great and is so elegant. Perfect for weddings and when you want to be a little dressed up. Flowing chiffon makes the skirt hang nicely.
Fue regalo
Perfect fit and made well !  Paired with black T - perfect !!!  No picture but will soon !!
This skirt has a lining so it is not sheer.  It is really pretty and colorful so I have a lot I can wear with it.
Great skirt, great price.  So pretty and flowy.  Skirt is VERY long.  Too long even in heels (I am 5’5”).  So I pulled it up, threw on a belt and blazer…lots of compliments.
I really enjoyed wearing this skirt. I've received many compliments.  It's even prettier in person.
Love this skirt! Super flowy…. And beautiful!!!

What’s NOT to love??? Flows beautifully. Fabric is soft and silky. The pattern and colors are gorgeous. Quality is much higher than I expected. You can dress up or down. Long sleeves for fall, short for summer. I love this skirt!

评论概述: Love it! Love it! Love it!
评论详情: Absolutely gorgeous! Not the high end quality fabrics but for this price is absolutely amazing! Great fit, great print and colors!
Skirt is bulky and runs a tad long.  Inexpensive alteration resolved fit issues.  Looks great paired with a wide belt and body suit!
A beautiful skirt. It's a little long. I'm 5'2" so that's to be expected. But I love it!
beautiful skirt, received many compliments.

评论概述: Too small than what they posted
评论详情: Did not give right information for measurements
The seams for the skirt I had was not made correctly. Had to return unfortunately. But was very pretty.

评论概述: Poorly made and not for 5’5” and below
评论详情: I’m 5’5” 195lbs. My usual size is XL. This was WAY too big in every way. The waist was huge. The skirt was dragging the ground by about five inches and it was just too much material all around. It made me look three sizes wider. Two things I did like though: the color pattern is gorgeous; it’s exactly as advertised. It arrived quickly.

评论概述: It’s very sheer, like it’s layered but still so sheer.
评论详情: Very sheer, beautiful but like not even a slip is saving me here. This will be a great swimwear coverup tho

Very cute skirt. It is lined, so no worries about sheerness. It is lightweight, but I also feel like this could be worn as a transition piece for early fall. I am 5’9 and it was long enough. Also very stretchy in the waistband so it was not binding at all.
This skirt was too wide. It possible will look good on a wide hip person
Love, love, love. I am 5ft 10in and it's on the long side...yay! Welp...ordered more a year later and now they are 2 inches shorter! It's still a good product....just wish it had the extra 2 inches.
Definitely not a Chicwish skirt. The colors were off and the material felt cheap and flimsy. I returned it.
This skirt is made with good quality. The first was pretty. I am tall and length was perfect.
